ValidationRule.description: If a Scale opportunity record is in quoted or proposal approved/closed won, description can't be blank.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
$Setup.Master_Validation__c.Account_Active__c && ($RecordType.Name = "Scale") &&
AND( ISBLANK (Description), $Profile.Name <> 'Scale-Underwriter',
OR( ISPICKVAL (StageName , "Proposal Approved/Closed Won"), ISPICKVAL (StageName , "Quoted")))
